name: FloatGrids VR Design System
description:
What is FloatGrids?


FloatGrids is a VR design system which intends to be the starting point of a bigger project where everybody is welcome to participate and add improvements.


FloatGrids intends to give UX and UI designers a tool to create, prototype and test digital products for the Metaverse.


This design system is focused on a non-diegetic UI, so it provides a system to create 2D interaction within a 3D environment.


What will you find in the file?
